胕字的基本解释

胕
fū
古同“肤”，皮肤：“尾湛胕渍。”
古同“跗”，足。

胕
fú
浮肿：“寒热胕肿。”

胕
zhǒu
古同“肘”。

胕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǔ］
［《廣韻》符遇切，去遇，奉。］
(1)同“腑”。
(2)腐烂。
(3)指加工成腐状的食物。
[②]［fū］
［《集韻》風無切，平虞，非。］
(1)同“膚”。
(2)足背。
[③]［fú］
［《集韻》馮無切，平虞，奉。］
浮肿。

胕字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　胕； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页978第13
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】符遇切【正韻】防父切，?音附。【揚子·太?經】肺胕之行。【廣韻】肺胕，心膂。【集韻】人之六腑也。【正韻】晉書作肺腑，誤。　又【集韻】風無切，音膚。足也。或作趺?。【戰國策】服鹽車而上太行，蹄申膝折，尾湛胕潰。【釋文】胕，音膚。　又【五音集韻】防無切，音扶，腫也。【山海經】竹山有草焉，其名曰黃雚。浴之已疥，又可以已胕。【註】治胕腫也，音符。　又【韻會】通作附。【前漢·劉向傳】臣幸得託肺附。【註】肝肺相附著也。

胕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
胕字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Gnaw
fū
The ancient same "skin", skin: "The tail is stained."
The ancient same "hock", foot.
Gnaw
fú
Puffiness: "Cold and hot swelling."
Gnaw
zhǒu
Gu Tong "elbow".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [fǔ]
["Guangyun" Fu Yuqie, Quyu, Feng. ]
(1) Same as "Fu".
(2) Rotting.
(3) Refers to food processed into rot.
[②]［fū］
["Jiyun" wind is not cut, Pingyu, non. ]
(1) Same as "skin".
(2) Instep.
[③] [fú]
["Jiyun" Feng Wuqie, Pingyu, Feng. ]
edema.
Gnaw

[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　胕; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 978 13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Fu Yuqie [Zheng Yun] Preventing the father from cutting, with the sound attached. 【Yangtze·Tai? Classic】A journey to the lungs. [Guang Yun] Lungs, heart fascinated. [Jiyun] The six organs of people. [Zheng Yun] Jin Shu is a mistake.　[Jiyun] The wind is not cut, the sound is skin. Foot also. Or as a feast?. [Warring States Policy] Serve the salt cart and go to Taihang, the foot shrank and the tail collapsed. 【Explanation】Gnat, tone and skin.　[Five-tone Jiyun] Prevents no cuts, supports sound, and swells. [Shanhaijing] There is Caoyan in Zhushan, and its name is Huangyu. The bath has been scabies, but also can be eaten. [Note] Cure swollen gnaw, note.　 [Rhyme Club] is also attached. [Previous Han·Liu Xiangchuan] The minister was fortunate enough to support his lungs. [Note] The liver and lungs are also attached to each other.
